metadata.title: CVE-2019-19337 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in Red Hat Ceph Storage version 3 in the way the CephRADOS Gateway daemon handles S3 requests. An authenticated attacker canabuse this flaw by causing a remote denial of service by sending aspecially crafted HTTP Content-Length header to the Ceph RADOS Gatewayserver.

criterions.comment: ceph: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
